data.title: Interactions of dialkylmagnesium compounds with 15-crown-5: formation in solutions and solids of RMg(15-crown-5)+ and magnesiate ions

questions.question: What is the publication year of the article discussing the interactions of dialkylmagnesium compounds with 15-crown-5?
Which journal published the research on the formation in solutions and solids of RMg(15-crown-5)+ and magnesiate ions?
questions.answer: Journal of the American Chemical Society

questions.question: How many authors contributed to the study on dialkylmagnesium compounds' interactions with 15-crown-5?
What is the bond length between Mg(1) and C(1) as reported in the study on RMg(15-crown-5)+ formation?
Based on the bond angles provided, what is the bond angle between C(2)-Mg(2)-C(3) in the magnesiate ions?
What is the estimated standard deviation for the fractional coordinate of Mg(1) in the x-direction?
Considering the bond lengths involving Mg atoms, what is the relationship between the bond length of Mg(1)-O(5B) and Mg(2)-C(2)?
If the bond length of Mg(1)-O(1A) is 2.190(7) Å, what can be inferred about its bond strength compared to Mg(1)-O(2B) with a bond length of 2.096(13) Å?
questions.answer: Mg(1)-O(2B) likely has a stronger bond than Mg(1)-O(1A)

questions.question: Given the bond angles in the MeMg (15-crown-5)+ ions, what can be inferred about the molecular geometry around Mg(1)?
questions.answer: The geometry is complex due to varying bond angles

questions.question: Based on the anisotropic temperature factors, which atom has the highest mobility in the structure?
Considering the synthesis conditions, is it true that the study was published in the Journal of the American Chemical Society in 1988?
The bond length of Mg(1)-O(5A) is shorter than that of Mg(1)-O(1B), true or false?
The bond angle of C(2)-Mg(2)-C(3) is greater than that of C(3)-Mg(3)-C(4), true or false?
The study provides fractional coordinates for more than one magnesium atom, true or false?
The bond lengths involving only atoms of the crown ether in sites A and B are identical for all pairs, true or false?
The anisotropic temperature factors indicate that all atoms have the same degree of thermal motion, true or false?
The publication of the article predates the electronic publication date by 14 years, true or false?
